title: Thresh Relic Shield
body: hi, this might be a stupid thread but why is thresh with relic shield a little bugged? like you literally have to last hit the minion, although if you used another champion, eg braum, you could aa it at like half health and it proc? and take it easy on me, im silver :P

replies.body: I don't see why it doesn't work on Thresh though to be honest. Or any ranged champions for that matter. It's so good on Thresh and it 100% should work on him
thats because the passive on the item is melee only thresh is a ranged champion
ahh, but when i go in melee range with thresh, it still doesnt work out right haha
it doesnt matter how far away you are thresh is a ranged champ like ashe and vayne. The passive only works with melee champs
people who say something that is wrong and still think they're right and try to convince us need to gtfo
what are u on about i am right lol. Prove me i am wrong pls i wanna see it :D
you're talking about the PASSIVE, and the PASSIVE allows for both team members to get the gold from a support thresh last hit

He's talking about the passive execute of minions. Read the post mate.

Thresh has to last hit in order to use his targons because he is ranged and is unable to get the execute bonus.

(this is why its a good idea to save your flay passive if you want to try and last hit tank minions)
you read the post. he said passive. he didnt say passive execute did he? read the post mate. read the post
Read the post bro. He specifically mentioned having to last hit minions rather than being able to execute them at half health. Are you for real right now?
I'm fairly sure Rocka is correct, the only champion that can switch auto attacks between melee and ranged is Jayce by my understanding.
i am right its just funny watching him argue his way in a lost battle.
